item.title: Running Native Executables
item.description: Native components are a good way to get started with Viash and are ideal to test out your components before using the more sophisticated platforms like Docker and Nextflow. Running native executables Running a native component Use the viash run command to run a native component directly: viash run -p native config.vsh.yaml -- --input "Hello!" item.title: Executables With a Docker Backend
item.description: Executables with a Docker backend make it easy to adhere to strict version requirements as well as simplifying the management of dependencies. Running Docker executables Running a component Use the viash run command to run a component with a Docker backend directly: viash run -p docker config.vsh.yaml --setup ifneedbecachedbuild -- --input "Hello!" Note: If you make changes to the platform section of your config file, you will need to run --setup again.
